article_title: Shutdown Power Play: Stoking Racism, Fear Of Culture Change To Push Anti-Government Agenda

article_metadata.description: What’s striking about Tea Party and evangelical supporters who took part in interviews is how much their anger and political stance is motivated by a dread of the cultural changes taking place in this country and their fear and animus towards people of color and immigrants.
article_metadata.author: Rob Waters
